channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Cloud Statistics Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Cloud Statistics Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21631|2024-08-03T18:16:23.849Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cloud%20statistics%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Cloud Statistics Plugin 0.26 and earlier does not perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission and knowledge of random activity IDs to view related provisioning exception error messages.
